channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mamdani slammed for using kids in campaign videos after gloating about social media-free childhood
item.description: NYC mayoral hopeful Zohran Mamdani draws backlash from Instagram followers for using elementary school kids to promote his political campaign.

item.title: Dow futures rise as recession fears grow while Wall Street awaits the one thing that could derail Fed rate cuts
item.description: On Thursday, the consumer price index is due, and Wall Street sees a 0.3% gain, accelerating from the 0.2% pace a month earlier.

item.title: Ohio donors ditch Tim Ryan, pour nearly $220K into Vivek Ramaswamy’s governor bid
item.description: Republican Vivek Ramaswamy's Ohio gubernatorial campaign has attracted nearly $220,000 from donors who previously supported Democrat Tim Ryan.

item.title: Age-Old Bible Tales in a New Light

item.title: Where’s the Critical Coverage of Left-Wing Conspiracy Theorists?
item.description: The online hysteria over Trump’s health should have been roundly condemned, not treated as a quirky viral cultural event.

item.title: Disclosure Laws Put Targets on the Backs of Nonprofit Donors
item.description: In an age of doxxing, violent threats, and professional retribution for people’s policy positions, exposing donors creates real risks.

item.title: South Korea reaches deal with US to release workers detained after immigration raid
